definition: Zhuang language/language of the Zhuang ethnic group 壯族|壮族[Zhuang4 zu2] of Guangxi
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: Not even Horry's heroics could have saved the Lakers on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 在星期二晚上，就算是霍里的豪言壮语也救不了湖人。

sentences.english: Pangu is the phonetic notation of Chinese characters to "Pangou" of Zhuang language.
sentences.chinese: 盘古是壮语“盘勾”的汉字记音。

sentences.english: Both the general names and the proper names are the important parts of the Zhuang geograpnical names system.
sentences.chinese: 通名和专名是壮语地名词汇系统的重要内容。

sentences.english: The words were not just rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 这些并非只是豪言壮语。

sentences.english: Raj: Ooh, big talk from a man who was once treed by a chicken.
sentences.chinese: 噢，一个曾被鸡追到树上的人的豪言壮语。

sentences.english: On economic matters, similar ambitions had been expressed before.
sentences.chinese: 关于经济，类似的豪言壮语曾经表达过。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 is focused on the semantic meaning of complement in verb-complement structure of Zhuang language.
sentences.chinese: 第三章分析了壮语述补结构中补语的语义。

sentences.english: The numeral is a part of speech which has great difference in Zhuang and Thai language.
sentences.chinese: 数词是壮语和泰语差别较大的一个词类。

sentences.english: Did you learn these pretty gallantries at Rome?
sentences.chinese: 你是在罗马学的这些豪言壮语吗？

sentences.english: For now, PayPal has shied away from using revolutionary rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 如今，贝宝不再发出革命的豪言壮语。

sentences.english: There are original relation inseparably between the Cantonese and Zhuang Laguage.
sentences.chinese: 粤语与壮语有着脱不开的渊源关系。

definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
Jingpo ethnic group of Tibet and Yunnan
Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia
Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia
the first Chinese dialect dictionary, edited by Yang Xiong 揚雄|扬雄[Yang2 Xiong2] in 1st century, containing over 9000 characters
